author: Gaurav Gupta
title: Time away from cricket was torture: Prithvi Shaw
description: Just as he was finding his feet on the big stage after a string of controversies, young and talented India opener Prithvi Shaw has to again contend with an indefinite layoff.
content:
The lockdowns due to the coronavirus pandemic have put a halt on all sporting events and cricket is no different. Talented India opener Prithvi Shaw would have been keen to show off his skills in the IPL, but is right now spending time at home.
He was sideli… [+8303 chars]
